column2: You know, from the sound of it, they must have joined up with the Federation pretty recently.
I think now I’m starting to see what Princess Sarah meant.
Well, for now, why don’t we see if we can go talk to that thane guy about the League of S?
I’m probably wasting my breath, but try to watch what you say around here.
Looks like the thane’s manor is at the very tippity the-top of the town. Let’s mooove...it the-out!
